content.detailedDescription: I was driving on tittabawasee rd going east toward saginaw from freeland.  as looked up to the east i noticed what looked like a commercial plane.  it was different though...No wings.  it was a cigar shape.   it just sat there from the whole duration from when i turned onto that road from m-47.  it took me around 15 minutes because traffic was very busy that particual day.  i am very into aviation and i know the difference from a plane and what i saw.  after a while i had to watch the road because i was getting into the city...I lost sight of it.
content.summary: The most shiny silver looking object that i've ever seen....Just sat there in the sunny sky.

content.detailedDescription: When i walked out of my sister's home i looked up and there it was. it was about 60 degrees up in the night sky and after a couple of minutes it had dropped another 15 degrees. it was lit up and seemed to strobe. it appeared to have a white light and a red light. the lights were strobbing, or the object was actually circling in a small radius. i know it was not an airplane or helicopter. it just hung there in the sky until it dropped. the lights were really moving fast and appeared to be moving in a circular motion. i've never seem anything like this before. i have seen lights in the sky that i couldn't id but never like this. it just seemed to hang in the air until it dropped. i don't know what happened to it after i got into my car. my sister also saw it. i asked her if she saw it when i first noticed it and she did. we stood there for a couple of minutes discussing whether she should go get her camera.  she has a small digital camera and decided that it wasn't strong enough to show anything.
content.summary: A circular object that had strobbing lights.

content.detailedDescription: While driving east at 8:40-8:50, i spotted a star like figure in the sky. i stopped at the stop-sign and it started to move. then, i thought it was an airplane. until it stopped and stated to rotate at an intense speed. i was like" what is that!!!" i stopped and sat there watching it do this for about 30 more seconds. i got freaked out and turned right and when i looked back it was no longer there. i was so scared!!!
content.summary: Circling at an intense speed.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside and looked up because a plane was landing.  right next to the plane was a perfectly round, really high up, but plain as day silver, noiseless ball. it was not a disc.  it was traveling at a tremendous rate of speed, with no noise, and no heat trail.
content.summary: Flying silver ball.

content.detailedDescription: See description from 5 - 21- 2009
content.summary: Pictures of what i saw last night. actual photo of the site - added what i saw onto it w/photoshop. #2 photo - enlarged and contrast enhanced but not color. see prev. report for details.

content.detailedDescription: We were at our local social club with the children outside playing.The children ran in to me and told me to quickly follow them to see something strange. as i went out into the open field i witnesed six lights in the sky wich wre in a triangular formation in threes.The first three moved upwards and gradually faded away these were followed by the last three which did the same.The chidren told me it had started with two orange lights comming from what looked like the ground behind the trees in the distance,these were imediatly followed by several more approx 15.All the children witnessed this and my 17 year old daughter got some footage on her mobile phone which does not look like normal air trafficthese lights were orange and appeared circular .They went into a formation.All of us were fasinated and amazed
content.summary: Series of lights in triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription: As me and my friends were driving down the road i noticed a group of bright lights sitting in the sky. i immediately speed for a place to park and film. i was extremely excited to be able to film this event. i was in horn lake filming in the shnucks parking lot. i got out the car and quickly began filming. it started off with 5 lights in a formation and as i began filming there were four but one was leaving. when i first noticed these objects i knew that these were not planes. planes dont sit in the same spot for an hour. but as i filmed helicopters began to head for the lights. as i filmed the helicopters as they multiplied i film back at the ufo lights and bam one was missing. but how can it just vanish and not be seen? an airplane would still be seen if it was leaving but this light was gone completely leaving only 3 lights left. the formation then began to shift. then two smaller lights appear below the big 3 lights and they all sit in the same spot and then another small light appears out of nowhere and sits there. the lights then all seem to be coming towards each other. we then decide to head closer to the object as we thought we could get a better view but we didnt. the video i filmed lasts 5 minutes. its good quality and our reactions are just shocked i guess. i mean what else would you do if you love to read and hear about ufo's and you finally get to film one. i am extremely happy to have caught this footage. i have always believed in ufo's and that the government is indeed hiding something from us. i hope this video attracts many people into believing that there is something going on in our skies, and that i was very lucky to capture this footage. i hope you enjoy. by the way my names jimmie jones. my email is alienboy91@yahoo.Com the link to the video on youtube is http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=hyltaqfl3aa
content.summary: Weird lights in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know what to put for county event occurred in.  i just selected a random county so i could submit.

i have always believed in the existence of ufos, but never saw anything i could categorize as such until my freshman year of college.  my best friend at the time, raymond, accompanied me on a long day trip from odessa to san antonio.  we wre freshmen in college, and didn't have enough money to spend the night in a hotel.  we took just enough money for eating and drinking.  around 10 p.M., we headed back to odessa, about a 5 hour drive.  we were on the last leg of the trip where we had to pass threw some of the small towns on the way north from i10 to odessa.  these are towns where the population is generally under 1,000.  at night, you're the only one driving down main street.  

as we started to approach rankin, we noticed that on the open highway behind us, there appeared to be a motorcycle behind us.  we were doing about 65 mph.  i owned a dodge 4 cylindar that wouldn't do much more than 80 mph.  the strange thing is, the light came right up on us, and then stayed right off our rear bumper.  with no one else in the road for miles in either direction, we didn't know why the vehicle wouldn't just pass.  over the next few minutes, it would drift back maybe 100 yards, then close the distance again.  it did this repeatedly, for miles.  what happened next is we started seeing two lights, in different configurations, that is... one on top of the other, or two side by side.  we were already concerned, it was clear we were being "messed with" by something.  

rankin was approaching on the horizon.  as we came in town, the main road lead right to a convenience store.  we pulled in the lot and turned the car back in the direction we had just came from.  we wanted to see what had been behind us.  the light had drifted back as we approached town.  we sat there, pretty scared at this point, waiting... for about 10 minutes.  nothing ever came.  we slowly drove through the small town, looking for the state highway on the outskirts.  the entire way, there were street lights.  nothing ever came through that town behind us, we watched carefully.  we got back on the road, this time headed toward iraan.  we drove a solid 10 minutes past rankin with nothing in the rear view mirror.  then, off in the distance, we saw a single light, again closing the distance.  we really became concerned at this point.  i tried driving faster, but it made no difference to the light, the same pattern of behavior continued.  

i asked raymond to climb into the back seat and look closely through the hatch window.  even though the light was right on us, it appeared just to be a light.  we couldn't see the outline of a vehicle, person, motorcycle, anything.  it just appeared to be a light.  i have had people ask me why i didn't just tap the breaks or stop the car.  i don't think it really seriously ever occurred to us.  raymond and i just wanted to keep going... to get home.  we were in the middle of nowhere, and if we could just keep going, that was the best thing.  

we came into iraan, and did the same thing.  we sat in the lighted parking lot of the first convenience store we saw, and waited.  nothing.  this time, we even waited longer.  but sure enough, once we were a good distance outside of town, the light appeared.  the light followed us until we were only about 40 miles outside of odessa.  as the lights loomed on the horizon, the light just faded off into the distance, and left us alone.  

could it have been a person somehow doing this and we just couldn't see them?  sure.  but why?  we're talking about a great distance this light followed us, and for over two hours.  i have no logical explanation for this.  i lived in a house alone back then.  i do know that it was one of the most terrifying nights of my life.  even when i got home, i laid in the darkness of my bedroom feeling the strongest sensation of being watched all night.  when sunrise came the next day, it was the most beautiful thing i had ever seen.  

i took my wife to meet raymond in san antonio after we got married (raymond lives there now).  the two couples were having dinner, and raymond brought it up.  it is something that has never left the minds of either of us.
content.summary: Lights pursued our car for over two hours between small towns in dead of night

content.detailedDescription:
Hello,
my name is [cms/tg/pid] i, i live on the [pid] side of casa grande, around 9:20pm tonight i was in my front yard and looking in the direct of table top (west) and noticed two orange lights just to the north of table top. they would have been higher in the sky than table top is. they where at the same level with each other and did not move, side to side or up and down. the one close to table top went out the other stayed on. they did have a little flicker to them. about five minutes later the last one went out. they could hve been flares but the stayed at the same level all the time.
 
this was the same location that my wife and i seen lights the night of the phoenix lights bakc in the 90s.
content.summary: Hello.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside talking to a friend and my brother when i noticed a bright light in the sky, i pointed it out and my brother joked that it was a watch tower, but you cannot see any mountains from my house- it was weird how there was something that looked like a comet just standing still. it really fascinated me when i noticed this.  i have always kept up with ufo news and this clearly wasn't a plane, helicopter, or a planet- so i made the connection that it is a unidentified flying or hovering object.


this bright light seemed to appear to be changing sizes ever few seconds and it would brighten and dim its lights constantly. it seemed like it was staying in the same place for pretty long but after 20 or 30 minutes it started to slowly drift upwards. this whole event really surprised me, i plan on keeping an eye out more often- i am fascinated that there are these mysterious silent things in the sky that seem to come out when everyone is sleeping.

i lost sight of the object because i was tired so i went into my house and checked up on it every few minutes and eventually it just drifted away.
content.summary: Bright silent slowly hovered into the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was having my breakfast. the kitchen of my house is in a hill, so i can see brasilia city from above. the sky was clean without clouds. the sun was shinning. suddenly a bright flash caught my attention. i looked outside and saw a huge, i mean, very huge, cigar shape object. it was gray, a polish gray, shinny. i could estimate the size because the tv tower that is 23 km distant from me and it has 35m high. the object, i calculate, had aprox. 30m long. it was hovering for 10 minutes until in a amazing speed shhot off to the sky!
i know that at least 5 more people saw it because i could see those people looking to the sky.
content.summary: A huge gray cigar shape object over sobradinho, df.

content.detailedDescription: It was early in the morning and i was running along the riverwalk, getting some excercise. i saw a teardropped shaft craft rise up out of the chatahoochee river to the right and hover for a few moments. it didn't stay there for long, but it was silver in color and looked smooth, with water still running off of it. the crafted rotated so that the "tip" of the teardrop was pointing towards the sky, at which point it just shot straight up into the air at a very high speed.
content.summary: Craft rose out of the water and shot into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Approx 9:50pm i went outside on to my back deck for a smoke. it was a clear night with many stars. i was looking up to the north and noticed a very bright orb which appeared to be hovering.At first i thought it was a bright star or planet then relaized it was to low to be one. it was some distance away and about 10000 ft high. i thought maybe a shooting star. it hovered for about 45 seconds and then speed away and was gone in 7 seconds. it shot straight up into the sky, i watched as it just faded away in about 7 seconds. shooting stars fall, this actually went higher in the sky until i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Bright white orb hovered then shot way.

content.detailedDescription:
The year was 1981, and i was in 8th grade at st.Georges homes, ketti, nilgiris dist., india. three or four friends and me were waiting outside the school dining hall one evening at around 6.30pm or 7.00pm for a movie to begin in the dining hall which doubled as a movie theater once a month, when one of us, pointed towards the sky and started watching a star that was moving, slowly like a satellite would.It looked just like any other medium sized star, but dont remember if it twinkled. at first we thought that we were looking at a satellite, however we realised it couldnt be a satellite because sometimes it stopped, sometimes it went backwards and also sideways in fact we realised it did not seem to have a fixed path, to us, the kids observing the star, it just seemed to move from one star to another randomly. we watched this star for a few minutes and then what happened next was so strange that it will be hard to believe. the star stopped moving when it was near the first star in the constellation big dipper. one of my friends casually remarked "what if it moved to the next star in the same constellation?" and to our surprise the wandering star appeared to do just that, it moved next to the next star in the constellation. since what just happened excited us, we again tried our luck and said "what if the star went back to the first star?" lo and behold it did just that, as if it was understanding or listening what we were saying. in this way, i think we spent nearly quarter or half an hour ordering the star about in the sky and everytime, it moved exactly to all the stars we asked it to move to.
as a graduate in science, i know that as per the laws of physics it is impossible for any object to move so fast from one star to another and also that the stars in a constellation only appear to be in a particular formation because of the position of the earth and solar system. but no matter what, the moving star did give us the impression it went near every star we asked it to go to...Have no clue how it did that or how it made us believe it was doing that or how on earth it heard what three or four small kids were talking between themselves.
there were other students near us when all this was happening, but for some reason we did not alert the other kids nor did we talk about the incident till i met one of my friends twenty three years later...Very strange, but true.
a couple of years earlier, the whole school had seen two small moon like stationary objects...
content.summary: Wandering star.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the sky from my backyard facing due east when out of the corner of my eye to the south i caught movement.  i turned expecting to catch a glimpse of a shooting star but what i saw was not lit up at all.  

the object moved across my field of view from south to north moving at a very high rate of speed; not quite as fast as a shooting star might move but it appeared many times faster than a satellite might seem to move. i did not notice any light as you would see with a star or satellite.  there was absolutely no sound and just before i lost sight of it to the north it appeared to slightly angle to the east. the best way i can explain it is it appeared as if something was cutting through the sky.  this is why i marked the shape as a cigar.  i can not tell if the object was shaped like a cigar or what but it was almost like watching a jet boat on the water from a high mountain top where there was a sort of wave or ripple left behind although there was no noticeable length of tail and i could not distinguish between the object and the sky. it took approximately 3 seconds to go from one side of my view to the other.

i watched this object move across the whole of my horizon and thought to myself: "no way, what the hell was that?  seriously, what the hell was that? no way, no way!"

the night was mostly clear but with a few high altitude light hazy sort of clouds around.  the more i think about it the more i wonder if it could have been some sort of stealth military air craft, but i just don't know.
content.summary: Silent but speedy and dark object cutting through the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 4:50am, i was awoken by my two dogs barking like mad. beliving it was someone in my back garden, i went outside to see who it was. i went down stairs and into my back garden where i saw my dogs jumping up, upon going outside and looking around and up to see what the dogs here barking at.  i saw a massive triangle object, moving slowly, i would say in a north west direction. i could see the 3 corners of the object as each corner had a light on it, this light was a soft white light, and i could see the dark outline of the triangle itself. and as it moved slowly i was blocking out the stars. 

at this time my husband had come down to see what was going on when i pointed it out to him and he claimed it was just a plane going over head. he went back to bed while i watched this object slowly moving over some fields. the craft was very high up in the sky. i really could not say how high it was. 

the craft itself started to move away from my sight, so i quickly got some jeans and top on, and took my dogs into the back fields. (a note for where i live, it is very flat and newly built, so very open).

the craft at this time, i would say about 5:25 started to get smaller and go faster, i can only guess it was moving up in height and in speed. i noticed that a small orb of light seemed to appear from the middle of the craft and float down and vanish. i say float down as i would have though it would have dropped quicker if it was not under control. after this the craft quickly moved away and vanished into the distance over the next 30 mins. 

the craft made almost no sound, there was alittle humming sound, but it seemed more like a humming feeling than a sound itself. as i said before there was soft light on the 3 parts of it and you could make out the black body part that formed the rest between. i could not make out any more about it.

the orb that came out from it seemed to appear from the middle of the craft and floated down. i am not sure what it was, it was just a orb(sphere of light) that floated down.

while seeing the craft, it made me feel very relaxed and peaceful.
content.summary: Slow moving craft with second orb coming out.

content.detailedDescription:
I just went out on my deck before retiring. my house is elevated -- very clear views for a great distance. to the north of my deck is a large mountain that i believe is town hill mt which i think lies in maryland - i am very close to maryland and am just beside the potomac - i am in hampshire county, wv.
honestly -- i keep my eyes open for ufos here because i can see so far and it is rural -- no lights, lots of stars.
so -- tonight i finally saw one.  it was roughly spherical - it was totally illuminated a rich golden, almost the color of cantaloupe. it very very definitely was beaming a spotlight down onto the ground. 
where it was - is a location i look at every day -- i know it well. there is nothing there but trees -- it was the base of this mountain and at times it "beamed" farther up the mountain. as if it were looking for something -- but there is nothing over there i dont think even any houses.
it stood perfectly still a lot of the time. usually with its "beam" shining down. if it were a helocopter i should easily have been able to hear it here -- it is very quiet here and this object was not very far away -- maybe 5 miles. maybe 2 miles. 
it eventually moved off toward the west -- that might put it heading over keyser, wv, maybe springfield or ft ashby - maybe it would eventually get near cumberland md. when it moved off, it was slow. still beamed down from time to time.
i assume that a helocopter does not glow golden with a consistent bright golden light all around it. i think a copter would have headlights -- but not the entire thing would be shining bright gold. 
i dont know how quickly you read these reports -- but if you could forwarn someone west of me to be ready i think they could film it.
i tried to photo it -- will review the pix in a minute but i dont think they will be helpful.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Roughly spherical illuminated object  its light was golden with small red lites also sometimes. it was very definitely beaming a "spotlight" onto the earth.

content.detailedDescription: I have photographed another ufo ans dunno what it is...See pic
content.summary: Didnt see the object.

content.detailedDescription:
Guys,


i didn't know who else to e-mail outside of my circle of friends about what my wife and i witnessed last night. my wife and i saw something in the sky's over lake elsinore ca that appeared to be a satellite moving in orbit coming out of the north east at extreme altitude or space. the object appeared to be traveling a little faster than a typical satellite moves which got my attention.
we were out on our deck  observing the lake and the stars when it appeared. i had my binoculars with me which i use to observe air traffic witch is a hobby of mine being a helicopter pilot. when i saw the object i decided to look at it with my binoculars. i was able to follow it and trying to make out its shape. thats when it started to slow down then circle around and stop. in a panic i told my wife to look at it. it then appeared circle around it' position a couple times and then hover again. we then saw another light that seemed to be turned on and thats when i was able to make out its shape. as i looked at it with the binoculars i could see that there were 3 lights in triangle formation. in the center was a dark shadow. so it was definitely triangular shape. suddenly it emitted a blue flash of light almost looked like when you look directly at a laser beam head on but with a rapid flashing. about 2 mins later it light up and shot out about a 30 degree angle up and upon doing so it almost resembled the opposite of a shooting star but at a upwards vertical rather than down. this scared us quite a bit and we were both panicking.  i don't have pictures or video because it all happened in about 8 to 11 mns and i was glued as well as my wife. we just recently moved here and my recorder is still boxed up in the garage.  i have already ruled out the space shuttle for we wouldn't need it if we had a craft like this. my wife and i are shaken up about this and i am questioning the reason for all this.

i can talk in more detail about this verbally if you like.

lucius luciano
content.summary: Ufo seen by husband and wife approaching from the northeast.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out side a few weeks ago . there was a storm coming . and i just took a picture , out of no wheres at green branch park . 4 little tan men to the left bottom of the picture !
content.summary: Picture of a group of aliens , i think . thats what they are these ones

content.detailedDescription:
Cuando ocurrio el suceso estaba de cazeria con mi padre y yo queria tomar una foto al paisaje. en ese momento no vi nada, pero cuando vimos la foto mas detalladamente vimos que era algo extrano en la forma de ser.
en el lugar del suceso hay un aereopuerto cerca pero en la image no parece tal.
el lugar es en runge a 56 kilometros del norte de santiago.
cuando vi la imagen detalladamente, senti una sensacion confusa ya que en el lugar de los hechos no se veia nada.
content.summary: Yo tome la fotografia cuando estaba de paseo con mi padre. despues en casa vimos que era un ovni.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of our building after i was done i put the pictures on the computer and discovered what appeared to be a ufo im sending this in to see if it can be enhanced any more.  it must of been moving extremely fast with no sound.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of our building and after i put them on the pc i saw the ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 12:05 on may 15th i went outside to smoke a cigarette. i saw a blurr of 7 lights moving across the sky out of the corner of my eye. when i looked directly at it i saw this formation:

  .  .  .
 .  .  .  .

between these lights were 3 black or very dark triangles. they seemed pretty high in the sky and they were moving east to west and quickly dissapeared over the horizon.

at first i thought it could have been 3 nighthawk stealth jets but they were too close and seemed to be connected and/or sharing the one light between them. ive also learned that these kind of maneuvers are not typically done at night, nor have i ever heard of nighthawks around here as this is mainly a naval area.
content.summary: Saw 3 black triangles locked at the "wings."

content.detailedDescription:
It was in the evening time. we were making bbq outside on the grill. i am staying in an rv park, not very far from a major airport. a few days before this incident, i heard on the news that there had been a ufo sighting in saint louis, so i was purposely looking up keeping a watch, hoping for a sighting of my own. now i dont know if this is wishful thinking, but i wanted to report this information anyways because it may mean something to someone out there! 

my fiancee and i happened to be looking up into the sky and i noticed a plane which clearly had white vapor trails coming from its wings (i just assumed it was a very large plane, very high up, like an airbus or something), but then there was another object that was down and to the right of the airplane from my point of view. the object is best described as a shiny dot. i watched it for a while because it just seemed strange to me the 2 crafts were so close to each other in the sky, and it seemed they were close enough to each other, they could crash in mid air. after a few mins i realized the object was following the trails of the airplane and we watched it for a few mins. then the object just seemed to disappear in thin air, but you could clearly see the other plane still flying along, with its trails still visible.
content.summary: 2 objects in the sky, one disappeared after it seemed to be following the other object in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: On nasa downlink of atlantis, the craft moves fron left to right , it blends in with the light in front really wildcould be my mind. please look at enclosed file.Note: have had difficulty sending the file, can be found at nasa news service: title' view of thejourney home.
content.summary: I subscribe to nasa e-mail the ufo is on an e-mail picture sent today .

content.detailedDescription:
night dezember, lights intenses. make a video spectacular, amazing. never see on this world.

30 minuts spectacular images.


another day pictures some diferents a videos.

please contacte-me urgent
content.summary: No forms definidas- variours forms, transformers.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1997, i was stationed at fe warren air force base in cheyenne, wyoming. i decided to travel to a friends house who happened to be stationed in clovis, new mexico. it was very early in the morning approximately 0100 hours just as i crossed into the state of new mexico from colorado. i can not remember the road i was on, however i do remember that the road was winding through a mountain range.

it was a clear night and i noticed a set of 4-5 bright lights one right behind the other. the lead light was extremely bright and the remainder of the lights following the first light got progressively smaller and smaller. the lights that were following the lead light seemed to be following the lead light and the travel pattern appeared to mimic that of a snake.

i watched the pattern for a few moments then stopped my car and turned the ignition off. i was the only vehicle on the roadway and i could not hear any sound from the aircraft above. i was only in the air force for four years but i know what an f-16 and f-15 sound like at altitude and there was no sound coming from this aircraft. also the formation that this craft was flying was far too close to anything that i had ever seen. i would just like some answers.
content.summary: Strange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were feeding horses in a rural area between piedmont and edmond, ok.  she was outside the truck and i was sitting in the passenger side.  she first saw the object and noticed there was no sound.  i got out of the truck and watched the object along with her.  this object had 3 red lights and a smaller fourth light of a light color (yellow or white).  i could not see the body of the object, but the lights formed a triangle shape.  the lights were constant and not pulsating.  it was very low and moving too fast with an erratic flight path to be an airplane.  the object moved to the east and approximately 3 miles away, it began to hover.  it hovered in one place for approximately 30 seconds and then disappeared abruptly.  the entire event happened over a period of less than 45 seconds to a minute.

at first we wondered why an airplane or helicopter had no sound at that altitude.  when we saw the direction of movement, we realized that a plane was unable to perform this movement.  we were both observing this movement with a curiosity but when the object stopped the flight path and hovered in place and then disappeared in place, we knew we saw something unusual.  

neither of us had consumed any alcohol or drugs the entire day.  
neither of us have ever seen anything like this up to this time.
both of us feel a little unsettled at this point.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object came from south and made a right turn to the east. flew approx. 3 miles and then hovered  in place before disapearintg.

content.detailedDescription:
La fotograf���������a fue tomada el domingo 4 de enero de 2009, viajando a bordo de un barco de la compa���������ia buquebus, desde la ciudad de colonia del sacramento, uruguay, hacia buenos aires.
no tengo nada para contar del avistamiento, ya que no lo percib���������, s���������lo fue registrado por la camara, lo vi d���������as despu���������s cuando descargu��������� las fotograf���������as a la pc.
tengo varias fotograf���������as tomadas a esa hora, pero s���������lo en una aparece este objeto.

gracias.
content.summary: Ufo sï¿½lo registrado por la fotografï¿½a

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along the canal at 11pm sunday 17 march. i looked up at the sky as i so often do. i saw a bright orange light high up in the sky(about the size of venus to the naked eye) for about 6 seconds, it appeared to be stationary and then the light went out. i could just see a spec of light remaining where the orange light had been which appeared to move but then i couldn't keep track of it because it was so small. i thought it could have been a satelite reflecting the sun but i'm not sure. this is my 4th ufo sighting in ten years however each event has been entirely different.
content.summary: Bright orange light, looked very high up but remained still. then the light went out but i could still see a spec and then i lost it.
